answers.answer: this isn't a std related issue.grace

question: The first week in November my fiance' and I got a yeast infection.  Mine cleared in a weeks time but he still has his and sees the doctor each week.  He has type 2 diabetes and now the foreskin is tight and swollen and has split many times and at the point now he can't pull it back.  The worst fear is circumcision and he does NOT want that.  He's been on 4-5 medicines and topical and nothing is working.  He will be referred to a dermatologist at the next appointment.  He eats lots of fruits and veggies and watches his diet.  Is there anything he can do to help speed the recovery and make sure he doesn't lose his foreskin?  Erections are very painful and he avoids having them when he can.  We are worried sick over this.  It's been two months now!  Help us find a cure.
title: Yeast on Penis-2 months now!!!!!!!!!HELP
